short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Give feedback on your customer support conversations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Go beyond conventional QA with Zendesk QA – the AI-powered quality assurance solution that helps companies automate QA operations and solidify customer relationships through excellent CX.

Use our Chrome extension to securely give feedback on your customer support interactions anywhere – in your help desk, on social channels, or wherever else they may happen. Run an effective QA process, coach agents, and boost customer retention.
